meanings.definition: Of or relating to amyl alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The amylic scent of the perfume filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician studied the amylic compound under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The amylic aroma from the kitchen made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had an amylic quality that brightened the mood.
meanings.sent5: The amylic taste of the drink lingered on his tongue.

meanings.definition: Containing or derived from amyl alcohol.
meanings.sent1: The amylic solution was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The amylic substance was carefully measured before adding it to the mixture.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the amylic ingredient all over the counter.
meanings.sent4: The amylic essence of the flower was captured in the perfume.
meanings.sent5: The amylic content of the product was highlighted in the advertisement.
